text: Mateus Viveiros Andrade (born 17 January 1998) is a Brazilian football defender. ==Club career== Born in São Paulo, Viveiro started playing futsal when he was 6. When he was 11 he started playing football at São Paulo from Brasilia, but shortly after he moved to a more prestigious Brasilia Football Academy. It was playing in the academy that he earned a chance for trials at São Paulo FC and was successful at first.
